FastImport

public static int FastImport(java.lang.String tableName,
                             int sourceType,
                             int sourceID,
                             int unitid,
                             java.lang.String fileName,
                             java.sql.Date fromDate,
                             java.sql.Date toDate,
                             boolean bReplace,
                             java.lang.String status,
                             java.lang.String separator)
imports timeseries from a file using the application server provided functionality.

Parameters:
tableName - name of the timeseries table to import in
sourceType - type of source we are dealing with
sourceID - identifier
unitid - unit ref
fileName - filename where to import from
fromDate - from date, can be null
toDate - to date, can be null
bReplace - specify whether or not to replace original timeseries if duplicates are found
status - override status found in import file if specified, can be null
separator - separator of items in import file, can be null (default: comma <,>)
Returns:
amount of rows imported

FastExport

public static int FastExport(java.lang.String tableName,
                             int sourceType,
                             int sourceID,
                             int unitid,
                             java.lang.String fileName,
                             java.sql.Date fromDate,
                             java.sql.Date toDate,
                             java.lang.String separator)
exports timeseries to a file using the application server provided functionality.

Parameters:
tableName - name of the timeseries table to export from
sourceType - type of source we are dealing with
sourceID - identifier
unitid - unit ref
fileName - filename where to export to
fromDate - from date, can be null
toDate - to date, can be null
separator - separator of items in export file, can be null (default: comma <,>)
Returns:
amount of rows exported
